<div style="text-align: justify">
Zeel is a PostDoc at Microsoft Research India. His current research focus is on building fast and accurate retrieval models. Zeel did his PhD with focus on "AI for Social Good" at the <a style="text-decoration:none" href="https://nipunbatra.github.io/lab/">Sustainability lab</a>, <a style="text-decoration:none" href="https://www.iitgn.ac.in/">IIT Gandhinagar</a> advised by Prof. <a style="text-decoration:none" href="https://nipunbatra.github.io">Nipun Batra</a>.

#### Key Achievements
* Zeel was <a style="text-decoration:none" href="https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/academic-program/microsoft-research-india-phd-award-2024/">one of the 10 recipients</a> of Microsoft Research India PhD Fellowship Award 2024.
* Zeel was a Google Summer of Code (GSoC) contributor at TensorFlow in 2022 where he worked on the codebase of <a style="text-decoration:none" href="https://probml.github.io/pml-book/book2.html">Probabilistic Machine Learning: Advanced Topics</a> (<img src="https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/probml/pml2-book/total" alt="download stats shield">) book by Kevin Murphy.
* Zeel co-authored the "Active Learning" section in <a style="text-decoration:none" href="https://probml.github.io/pml-book/book2.html">Probabilistic Machine Learning: Advanced Topics</a> (<img src="https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/probml/pml2-book/total" alt="download stats shield">) book authored by <a style="text-decoration:none" href="https://www.cs.ubc.ca/~murphyk/">Kevin Murphy</a>. 

</div>
